item.title: Aviva 投资公司称德国国债收益率触及 4% 是可行的
item.description: Aviva Investors 认为，随着德国借贷成本的重置，德国 10 年期国债收益率升至 4% 是 "完全可行的"。【原文：Germany’s 10-year bond yield rising to 4% is “entirely feasible” as a reset in the country’s borrowing costs plays out, according to Aviva Investors.】

item.title: 波兰工资和产出削弱央行的稳健利率观点
item.description: 波兰的工资和工业产出数据正在挑战央行稳定的利率观点，并可能给决策者带来更大的压力，迫使他们自 2023 年以来首次削减借贷成本。【原文：Polish wage and industrial output data are challenging the central bank’s steady interest-rate view and are likely to pile more pressure on policymakers to cut borrowing costs for the first time since 2023.】

item.title: 一家人工智能初创公司无法击败微软。于是它加入了微软
item.description:
《AI Valley 》节选讲述了看似欣欣向荣的 Inflection AI 公司员工为何在 2024 年集体投奔微软的故事。【原文：

An excerpt from AI Valley tells the story of why the staff at Inflection AI, which seemed to be thriving, defected en masse to Microsoft in 2024.

item.title: 加拿大小型企业乐观情绪跌至 25 年最低点
item.description: 加拿大独立企业联合会（Canadian Federation of Independent Business）的数据显示，在美国对加拿大发动贸易战之后，加拿大中小型企业的乐观情绪降至至少四分之一世纪以来的最低水平。【原文：Optimism among Canada’s small and medium-sized firms fell to the lowest level in at least a quarter-century after the US started a trade war with the country, according to the Canadian Federation of Independent Business.】

item.title: 瑞士联合银行称瑞银全资化是最佳解决方案
item.description: 瑞士国家银行重申支持一项改革，该改革可能会迫使瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）保持多达 250 亿美元的额外资本。【原文：The Swiss National Bank reiterated its support for a reform that could see UBS Group AG forced to maintain as much as $25 billion in extra capital.】

item.title: 特姆普--业主 PDD 的收入低于预期，因为扩张速度放缓
item.description: 在国内竞争加剧和美国关税抑制其扩张之后，PDD Holdings Inc.【原文：PDD Holdings Inc.’s revenue grew a less-than-anticipated 24% after intensifying domestic competition and US tariffs crimped its expansion.】

item.title: 贸易谈判陷入僵局，中国将欢迎与特朗普结盟的参议员
item.description: 习近平主席的政府将迎来一位与唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关系密切的美国参议员，世界最大的经济体正试图推进停滞在较低水平的贸易谈判。【原文：President Xi Jinping’s government is set to welcome a US senator close to Donald Trump, as the world’s largest economies try to move forward trade talks that have stalled at lower levels.】

item.title: FCA 因 LME 在 2022 年镍危机中的失误罚款 920 万英镑
item.description: 英国金融行为监管局（Financial Conduct Authority）对伦敦金属交易所（London Metal Exchange）处以 920 万英镑（约合 1190 万美元）的罚款，原因是该交易所在处理 2022 年镍市场大规模空头挤压事件时缺乏足够的系统和控制措施。【原文：The Financial Conduct Authority has fined the London Metal Exchange £9.2 million ($11.9 million) for having inadequate systems and controls to deal with a massive short squeeze in the nickel market in 2022.】

item.title: 鲍威尔的讲话让股票和债券投资者放心
item.description: 市场数据截至美国东部时间上午 06:07。根据供应商协议，市场数据可能会有所延迟。【原文：Market data as of 06:07 am EST. Market data may be delayed depending on provider agreements.】

item.title: 安联集团与 Jio Financial 据称就印度合资公司达成初步协议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）的吉奥金融服务有限公司（Jio Financial Services Ltd.）已与安联集团（Allianz SE）达成初步协议，将在印度成立一家保险企业。【原文：Billionaire Mukesh Ambani’s Jio Financial Services Ltd., has reached a preliminary agreement with Allianz SE to form an insurance business in India, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 土耳其因在社交媒体上发布针对伊斯坦布尔市长的帖子而拘留数十人
item.description: 土耳其当局称，他们拘留了 37 人，因为他们在社交媒体上发帖批评伊斯坦布尔人气市长埃克雷姆-伊马莫格鲁（Ekrem Imamoglu）备受争议的拘留事件，该事件在周三引发了市场崩溃。【原文：Turkish authorities said they detained 37 people over social media posts criticizing the contentious detention of Istanbul’s popular mayor, Ekrem Imamoglu, which triggered a market meltdown on Wednesday.】

item.title: 为什么很难衡量人工智能对生产力的影响？
item.description:
我们需要更好的数据来确定人工智能应用是节省了时间还是征收了时间税。【原文：

We need better data to determine whether AI applications deliver time savings or impose a time tax.

item.title: 德国商业银行首席执行官表示今年开局良好，但对关税问题持谨慎态度
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）首席执行官贝蒂娜-奥洛普（Bettina Orlopp）表示，尽管经济学家警告说关税威胁将拖累德国今年的经济增长，但该银行今年的开局依然强劲。【原文：Commerzbank AG Chief Executive Officer Bettina Orlopp said the lender is off to a strong start this year, even as economists caution that the threat of tariffs will weigh on economic growth in Germany this year.】

item.title: 市场押注利率下行，国债延续美联储带来的涨势
item.description: 美国国债延续了周三美联储决议引发的涨势，因为市场确信政策制定者仍在走降低利率的道路。【原文：US Treasuries extended gains triggered by the Federal Reserve decision on Wednesday, as markets took reassurance that policymakers are still on a path toward lower interest rates.】

item.title: 收购公司 CVC 在扩张过程中关注美国私人信贷市场
item.description: CVC Capital Partners Plc 首席执行官罗布-卢卡斯（Rob Lucas）表示，CVC Capital Partners Plc 已将美国的私人信贷视为潜在的收购领域。【原文：CVC Capital Partners Plc has identified private credit in the US as an area for potential acquisitions, according to Chief Executive Officer Rob Lucas.】

item.title: 星链竞争者欧洲通信卫星公司（Eutelsat）股价涨幅达 300%，但因质疑声增多而停滞不前
item.description: 本月，投资者推动欧洲通信卫星公司（Eutelsat Communications SA）股价飙升近 300%，但他们对继续追涨已开始有所警惕。【原文：Investors who have propelled a near 300% surge in Eutelsat Communications SA shares this month are getting wary of chasing the rally any further.】

item.title: 挪威银行调查显示利率决定前活动性上升
item.description: 根据一项重要的企业景气调查，挪威企业上半年的经营活动可能会实现稳定增长，这将使挪威银行下周开始降息的计划成为一个千钧一发的决定。【原文：Norwegian businesses will probably report a stable growth in activity in the first half, according to a key survey of corporate sentiment that is set to make Norges Bank’s plan to start interest-rate cuts next week a close decision.】

item.title: 泰国央行放宽抵押贷款规定以促进房地产行业发展
item.description: 在需求疲软和供应过剩的情况下，泰国银行将放宽一些抵押贷款规定，以重振下滑的房地产行业。【原文：Bank of Thailand will relax some mortgage rules to revive the slumping property sector amid weak demand and oversupply.】

item.title: 通胀忧虑加剧，美国能源股领涨
item.description: 由于对通货膨胀的担忧加剧，投资者开始追捧石油和天然气生产商，使该集团在过去两年严重落后之后，重新回到了 S&P 500 指数排行榜的前列。【原文：Investors are taking cover in oil and gas producers as inflation fears mount, putting the group back at the top of the S&P 500 leaderboard after trailing badly the past two years.】

item.title: 尼日利亚石油区块竞标获胜者为科技公司所有
item.description: 一家由计算机服务公司控制的尼日利亚石油公司去年在竞标区块时击败了道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）和雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp），成为接管该国原油田的新兴本地公司之一。【原文：A Nigerian oil company, controlled by a computer services firm, that outbid TotalEnergies SE and Chevron Corp for blocks last year, is among emerging local companies taking over the nation’s crude fields.】

item.title: 特朗普希望加征关税的中国包裹已经开始下降
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）希望关闭贸易并对所有从中国进口的商品征收关税，中国公司上个月减少了运往美国的小包裹。【原文：Chinese companies cut back on the small packages they shipped to the US last month, as President Donald Trump looks to close off the trade and impose tariffs on all imports from China.】

item.title: 德国和法国推动从明年起降低欧盟天然气储存目标
item.description: 德国和法国是推动降低欧盟未来两年天然气储气库充气总量目标的国家之一。【原文：Germany and France are among a group of countries pushing to lower the European Union’s headline target for filling gas storages over the next two years.】

item.title: 储物柜起火迫使香港航空公司飞机紧急迫降
item.description: 香港航空公司一架航班的头顶储物柜在空中起火，迫使飞机周四在中国紧急迫降。据报道，机上 168 名乘客和机组人员无一受伤。【原文：A mid-air fire in the overhead lockers on a Hong Kong Airlines flight forced the jet into an emergency landing in China Thursday. None of the 168 passengers and crew on board were reported injured.】

item.title: 穆巴达拉考虑出售 10 亿美元持有的 Du 公司部分股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿布扎比主权财富基金穆巴达拉投资公司（Mubadala Investment Co.【原文：Abu Dhabi sovereign wealth fund Mubadala Investment Co. is considering plans to sell at least part of its $1 billion stake in telecom operator Du, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 通胀为何如此顽固？特朗普的关税战会让情况更糟吗？
item.description: 就在人们以为大通胀时代已经结束的时候，世界又重新认识到了价格稳定的脆弱性。【原文：Just when it looked like the Great Inflation era was over, the world is getting a reminder of how fragile price stability can be.】

item.title: 花旗集团私募股权 "俱乐部 "令亿万富豪成员大跌眼镜
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）有一个看似完美的方法，可以从富人流向私募股权公司的资金中分得一杯羹：在其富裕客户和一家新兴公司之间牵线搭桥。【原文：Citigroup Inc. had what looked like the perfect way to grab a slice of the money flowing from wealthy individuals to private equity firms: playing matchmaker between its rich clients and an up-and-coming firm.】

item.title: 特朗普对煤炭的热爱正撞击市场经济现实
item.description: 美国煤炭行业再次获得白宫的支持。然而，这不可能缓解经济挑战，因为经济挑战是这种最肮脏的化石燃料长期衰退的基础。【原文：The US coal industry is once again enjoying support from the White House. Yet that’s unlikely to quell the economic challenges that underpin a long-term decline for the dirtiest fossil fuel.】

item.title: 中国将投资 14 亿美元升级坦桑尼亚-赞比亚铁路线
item.description: 中国土木工程建设集团公司将投资超过 14 亿美元，重修一条连接赞比亚铜矿和坦桑尼亚最大港口的毛泽东时代的铁路线。【原文：China Civil Engineering Construction Corp. will invest more than $1.4 billion to revitalize a Mao-era railway line connecting copper mines in Zambia to Tanzania’s biggest port.】
